[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmplghktuod[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability has been detected in the Mongoose network [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibrary's ICMP packet handling code. The AddressSanitizer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASan[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m identified a [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read operation that attempts to access memory beyond the bounds of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated buffer during fuzzing tests. The overflow occurs in the `rx_icmp` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c`.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Vulnerability Type[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis is a **heap-buffer-overflow** vulnerability, specifically a READ operation [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat accesses [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte beyond the allocated heap buffer boundary. AddressSanitizer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhas assigned this a SCARINESS score of [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m, categorizing it as a [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m"1-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow"[0m[39m.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Issue Details[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability manifests during the processing of network packets, specifically [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen handling ICMP packets. The error occurs at the following location:[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **File**: `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m`[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Function**: `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line**: [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, column [0m[1;36m18[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Address**: [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe problematic read attempts to access memory at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis located exactly [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region allocated at `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. This indicates that the code is attempting to read one byte [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond the end of the allocated buffer.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Call Stack Analysis[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability is triggered through the following execution path:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - The fuzzer entry point that allocates [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe buffer[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - TCP/IP receive function[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - ICMP packet handler where the overflow occurs[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer is allocated via `malloc` in the fuzzer test harness at [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:95[0m[39m`, and the overflow occurs when this buffer is processed by the ICMP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling logic.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Memory Layout[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe shadow byte analysis reveals:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The buffer is a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m bytes partially addressable, indicated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby shadow byte `[0m[1;36m02[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow occurs at the boundary, attempting to read into the heap redzone [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marea [0m[1;39m([0m[39mindicated by `fa`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The memory region shows proper heap allocation patterns with redzones for [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetection[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Investigation[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and address this vulnerability, the following code areas should[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe examined:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Primary Location - `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`**:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `rx_icmp` function and its buffer boundary checks[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the function calculates buffer sizes and validates packet lengths[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The specific read operation that causes the overflow[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Packet Processing Pipeline - `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[39m`**:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_tcpip_rx` function and how it passes packet data to ICMP handlers[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Packet length validation before delegating to protocol-specific handlers[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any assumptions made about minimum packet sizes[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Data Structure Definitions**:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `pkt` structure definition and its size-related fields[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_tcpip_if` interface structure[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any header structures used for ICMP packet parsing[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Packet Length Validation**:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How incoming packet lengths are validated throughout the processing chain[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether there are checks to ensure buffers contain complete ICMP packets [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore accessing header fields[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Boundary checks before reading packet data at specific offsets[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **ICMP Protocol Handling**:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The complete implementation of ICMP packet processing[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How ICMP header fields are accessed and what assumptions are made about [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mminimum packet sizes[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether there are proper checks for truncated or malformed ICMP packets[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis vulnerability appears to be triggered by processing a specially crafted or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated ICMP packet that causes the code to read beyond the actual data available[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the buffer, suggesting insufficient length validation before accessing packet [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfields.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m813[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_client && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m68[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m814[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_server && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m818[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m819[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m820[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m821[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m822[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_udp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m823[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m824[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m825[0m[39m:    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m826[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m827[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m828[0m[39m:    uint16_t iplen = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    uint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m830[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen >= off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen - off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m831[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"TCP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m832[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m833[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m834[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m835[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:838[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m852[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m871[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x806[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m872[0m[39m:    pkt.arp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct arp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m873[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m874[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_ARP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m875[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_arp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m876[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x86dd[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m877[0m[39m:    pkt.ip6 = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip6 *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m878[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m879[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip6->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0x6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m880[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m881[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m898[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unknown eth type %x"[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m899[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_log_level >= MG_LL_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_hexdump[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, len >= [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m ? [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m : len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m900[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m901[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy for Heap Buffer Overflow in ICMP Packet Handling[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability stems from an incorrect assumption in the `rx_ip` function about [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 header length. The code assumes all IPv4 headers are exactly [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbase structure size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and calculates protocol header pointers using `pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`. [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, IPv4 headers can range from [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m60[0m[39m bytes due to optional fields. This [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcreates a critical mismatch:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **In `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: The payload calculation CORRECTLY accounts[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor IP options[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **In `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m802[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m807[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m825[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: Protocol header pointers are INCORRECTLY [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculated without considering IP options[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhen a packet with IP options is processed:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The payload boundary is calculated correctly [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter all IP header bytes including[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- But protocol pointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP/UDP/TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m point to the wrong location [0m[1;39m([0m[39mimmediately [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter the [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte base IP structure[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This causes out-of-bounds reads when accessing protocol header fields[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Comprehensive Fix Implementation[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix must be applied to **three locations** in the `rx_ip` function in [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### **[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. ICMP Handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m802[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - PRIMARY FIX**[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current vulnerable code:**[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m WRONG: Assumes [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte header[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fixed code:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### **[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. UDP Handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m807[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - SAME VULNERABILITY**[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current vulnerable code:**[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m WRONG: Assumes [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte header[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fixed code:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### **[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. TCP Handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m825[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - SAME VULNERABILITY**[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current vulnerable code:**[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m WRONG: Assumes [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte header[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fixed code:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Technical Explanation[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Understanding the IP Header Length Field:**[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `ver` field in `struct ip` contains two [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m-bit values:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Upper [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bits: IP version [0m[1;39m([0m[39mshould be [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m for IPv4[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Lower [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bits: Header length in [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m-bit words [0m[1;39m([0m[39mminimum value is [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Formula: `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m` extracts the header length in bytes[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Standard header: `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x45[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- With options: `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x46[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m24[0m[39m bytes`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why the Fix Works:**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Uses the same calculation as `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m892[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for consistency[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Correctly positions protocol pointers after ALL IP header bytes including [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Ensures `pkt->pay.len` validation checks match the actual memory layout[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Prevents out-of-bounds reads when accessing protocol header fields[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**What is NOT changed:**[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The validation logic using `pkt->pay.len` remains unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m803[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m808[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m826[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `mkpay` calls remain unchanged - they correctly recalculate payload after [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol headers[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All subsequent protocol processing functions remain unchanged[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- IPv6 handling remains unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv6 has fixed [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte headers without variable [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions in the base header[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fragmented packet handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m796[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m doesn't need fixes since those packets[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare rejected anyway[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Compatibility maintained:**[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- For standard [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte IP headers: `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m5[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` - identical [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- For headers with options: Now correctly accounts for actual header length[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All existing tests continue to work since standard packets have [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte headers[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Is Optimal[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Consistency**: Uses the exact same calculation pattern as `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malready uses for payload calculation[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Minimal Change**: Only modifies the pointer assignment calculation - no logic [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mflow changes[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Complete Fix**: Addresses all three affected protocols [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msystematically[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Standards Compliant**: Correctly implements RFC [0m[1;36m791[0m[39m IPv4 header length [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minterpretation[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Performance**: No additional overhead - just uses the correct pointer [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marithmetic[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Security**: Eliminates entire class of out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets with IP options[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Potential Impact:**[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m expected for well-formed packets[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Correctly rejects malformed packets with invalid IP header lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexisting [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation in `mg_tcpip_rx` at lines [0m[1;36m884[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m889[0m[39m already handles this[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Testing Considerations:**[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Standard packets [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte IP headers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m continue to work identically[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Packets with IP options are now handled correctly instead of causing buffer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflows[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzing should no longer trigger the heap-buffer-overflow with crafted IP option [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Reference to Existing Code Patterns[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis fix follows the established pattern in the codebase:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Lines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m892[0m[39m in `mg_tcpip_rx`**: Already uses `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for payload calculation[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Lines [0m[1;36m404[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m462[0m[39m in DHCP handlers**: Demonstrate correct buffer boundary [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation patterns[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix makes `rx_ip` consistent with the existing correct implementation in [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
