[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability detected by [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer during fuzzing of the mongoose codebase. The error occurs in the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m`, where a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread attempts to access memory beyond the allocated buffer. The patch attempt [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmodified the calculation of pointers for ICMP, UDP, and TCP headers to account for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable-length IP headers by using the IP header's version field to compute the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrect offset. However, after applying the patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror persists at the exact same location with identical characteristics.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report indicates a heap-buffer-overflow with the following [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacteristics:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: The read violation occurs at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m` in the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, column [0m[1;36m18[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c`[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Buffer Information**: The address is located [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Call Stack**: The error is triggered through the following path:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Allocation Context**: The buffer was allocated in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m95[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe SCARINESS score of [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m indicates a potentially exploitable [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies three locations in `src/net_builtin.c` around lines [0m[1;36m799[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m825[0m[39m, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifically within what appears to be a packet processing function. The changes [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtarget how protocol-specific headers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are accessed after the IP [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Original code pattern:**[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Patched code pattern:**[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempts to calculate the IP header length dynamically by:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Extracting the lower [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bits of the version field [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Multiplying by [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m to get the header length in bytes[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Using this as an offset from the IP header base address[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the fuzzer test produces identical results:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Same Error Location**: The heap-buffer-overflow still occurs at `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m385[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Same Address**: The violation occurs at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Same Buffer**: The [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer region remains identical [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Same Call Stack**: The execution path through the code is unchanged[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Same DEDUP_TOKEN**: Both errors share identical deduplication tokens[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates that the patch did not address the root cause of the buffer [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Key Observations[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Buffer Size**: The allocated buffer is only [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes, which is notably small [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor packet processing operations[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Overflow Location**: The overflow occurs immediately after the allocated [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, suggesting an exact boundary violation[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Persistent Error**: The patch modification to header offset calculation did [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot prevent the overflow, suggesting the issue may occur at a different stage of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **ICMP Processing**: The error consistently manifests in the `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction, specifically at line [0m[1;36m385[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and resolve this issue, the following areas should be examined:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Function Implementation**: Examine line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c` to [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstand what specific operation causes the read beyond the buffer boundary[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Buffer Allocation in Fuzzer**: Review `test/fuzz.c` line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m to understand how [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer is allocated and whether this size is appropriate for the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexpected packet processing[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Payload Length Validation**: Investigate the `pkt->pay.len` checks and the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function to ensure proper bounds checking before accessing ICMP data[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **IP Header Length Calculation**: Verify whether the patch's calculation [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is correct, or if it should use a different field [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., the IHL field which is typically in the upper [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bits[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **ICMP Structure Size**: Examine the `struct icmp` definition and how it's [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccessed in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to identify potential size mismatches[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Packet Structure Layout**: Review the overall `pkt` structure and how its [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfields [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ip`, `icmp`, `pay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m interact during packet processing[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Earlier Validation**: Check if there are missing length validations before the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket reaches `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` that should prevent undersized packets from being [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessed[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    uint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m835[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_server && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m826[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer in the `rx_icmp` function at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c`. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror indicates a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read beyond the bounds of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap-allocated buffer.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was attempted that added bounds checking and corrected IP header length [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculations in the `rx_ip` function to prevent out-of-bounds access. However, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter applying the patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow error persists at the exact[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot cause of the vulnerability.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` in the `rx_icmp` function[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type**: READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Buffer Details**: The read occurs [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Call Stack**: The error originates from `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp`[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **SCARINESS Score**: [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe shadow bytes indicate that address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m` is marked as `fa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheap [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleft redzone[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, confirming an out-of-bounds read beyond the allocated buffer.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies the `rx_ip` function in `src/net_builtin.c` starting at line [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m793[0m[39m. The changes include:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **IP Header Length Calculation**: Added calculation of IP header length based on[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe version field:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   uint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Initial Bounds Check**: Added validation that the IP header doesn't exceed the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket buffer:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m || [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Protocol Handler Pointer Adjustments**: Changed pointer arithmetic from using [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fragmented UDP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m799[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fragmented TCP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m802[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ICMP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m810[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - UDP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m816[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - TCP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m835[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Additional Bounds Checks**: Added validation after setting protocol-specific [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers to ensure the entire structure fits within the buffer:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **TCP Offset Calculation**: Modified the TCP offset calculation from using [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to using `ip_hlen` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m840[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the fuzzer still reports the identical error:[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same error location: `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same buffer address: `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same buffer allocation: [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same call stack: `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp`[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Identical shadow byte pattern[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates that while the patch added bounds checking in `rx_ip`, the actual [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow occurs within the `rx_icmp` function itself, which was not modified by the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo understand the complete scope of this vulnerability, the following areas should [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe examined:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **The `rx_icmp` Function**: Specifically line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `net_builtin.c` where the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual overflow occurs. The function needs to be analyzed to understand what read [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperation is causing the buffer overrun.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **ICMP Packet Payload Handling**: The `mkpay` function call at line [0m[1;36m813[0m[39m [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and how it interacts with subsequent processing in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **The `pkt` Structure**: Understanding how the `pkt->pay` field is set and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidated, particularly in relation to ICMP packet processing.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Buffer Size Validation**: The `pkt->pay.len` check at line [0m[1;36m812[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`if [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m may not be sufficient to prevent all [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds accesses.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Fuzzer Test Case**: The specific input in `[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m` that triggers this [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow should be analyzed to understand the malformed packet structure causing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe issue.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Related Protocol Handlers**: While the patch addressed `rx_ip`, similar [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvulnerabilities may exist in `rx_udp`, `rx_tcp`, and other protocol handling [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions that should be examined with the same scrutiny.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **The `mkpay` Function**: This function's implementation and how it calculates [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload boundaries needs investigation, as it's called before entering `rx_icmp`.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m808[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m809[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m810[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"UDP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m811[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m812[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m813[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_client && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m68[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m814[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m815[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m816[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_server && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m830[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen >= off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen - off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m831[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"TCP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m832[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m833[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m834[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
