[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:458[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m462[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m458[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Simple DHCP server that assigns a next IP address: ifp->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m459[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m460[0m[39m:  uint8_t op = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, *p = pkt->dhcp->options,[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m461[0m[39m:          *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m462[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m152[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:  pkt->pay =[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:824[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m830[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m824[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m825[0m[39m:    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m826[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m827[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m828[0m[39m:    uint16_t iplen = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    uint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m830[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen >= off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen - off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe evaluation report confirms that the previous patch did not resolve the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow issue. After careful analysis of the code snippets and error [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogs, I've identified the root cause:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause Identification[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Primary Issue in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: When IPv4 options are [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpresent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the code calls `mkpay` with a pointer that may exceed buffer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds: `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. There's NO validation that [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis calculated pointer is within `pkt.raw.buf + pkt.raw.len`.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Secondary Issue - `mkpay` Pointer Underflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m152[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: When `mkpay` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreceives an out-of-bounds pointer `p > pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, the subtraction[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p` produces a negative value. Cast to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`size_t` [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, this wraps around to a very large positive number [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m~[0m[1;36m0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFF[0m[39mxx[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Tertiary Issue - Protocol Pointer Calculation in `rx_ip`**: Even after the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevious patch attempted to fix this, the protocol pointers in `rx_ip` still use [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen`, but this is done AFTER `mkpay` was already called [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith a corrupted pointer in `mg_tcpip_rx`.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **The Actual Crash Location**: At `rx_icmp:[0m[1;36m384[0m[39m`, accessing `pkt->icmp->type` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcauses the crash because `pkt->icmp` points to invalid memory.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why the Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch added bounds checking in `rx_ip` and corrected protocol pointer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculations there, but it didn't address the fundamental issue: **`mkpay` is [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalled in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m892[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with an out-of-bounds pointer BEFORE `rx_ip` is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meven called**. By the time execution reaches `rx_ip`, `pkt->pay` is already [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrupted with a huge length value, causing all subsequent checks to fail.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Critical Logic to Preserve[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. IPv4 options handling must continue to work correctly[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. IPv6 packet processing [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich uses fixed [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte headers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m must remain unaffected[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. All existing protocol handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, TCP, UDP, DHCP, ARP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m must continue to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The packet truncation logic based on IP length field [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m886[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m888[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m must be [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserved[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Fragmented packet handling must continue to work[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Add IP Header Length Validation in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mBefore Line [0m[1;36m891[0m[1;39m)[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter line [0m[1;36m890[0m[39m where IP version is validated, add validation for the IP header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m After line [0m[1;36m890[0m[39m: if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m || ip_hlen > [0m[1;36m60[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IHL must be [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m15[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m60[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen > pkt.raw.buf + pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IP header [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmust fit in buffer[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThen replace lines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[39m:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Original problematic code:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39melse[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Replace with:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis ensures:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- IP header length is within valid range [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m60[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- IP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m fits within the packet buffer[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `mkpay` is always called with a valid pointer within bounds[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `pkt.pay` structure will have correct length and buffer pointer[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Keep Previous Patch's `rx_ip` Improvements But Adjust[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch's approach in `rx_ip` was mostly correct but needs refinement:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Remove the duplicate IP header length calculation**: Since we now calculate it[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `mg_tcpip_rx`, we need to either pass it to `rx_ip` OR recalculate it there. To [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mavoid changing function signatures [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich might break other code[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, recalculate it [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `rx_ip`.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Re-apply the previous patch's bounds checking pattern**, but ensure protocol [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers are validated BEFORE calling `mkpay` again [0m[1;39m([0m[39msince `mkpay` is called twice [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- once in `mg_tcpip_rx` and once per protocol in `rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFor ICMP handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m801[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the corrected code should be:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSimilar patterns for UDP [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m806[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m823[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and TCP [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m824[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m835[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Add Safety Check to `mkpay` Function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDefense in Depth[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAs a defensive measure, modify `mkpay` to handle out-of-bounds pointers gracefully:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstatic void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Pointer is beyond buffer, set empty payload[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis prevents the pointer underflow issue from propagating if any validation is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmissed.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Update Fragmented Packet Handling[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn the fragmented packet handling section [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m796[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, apply the same IP header[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength calculation:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m: Correct TCP Offset Calculation[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn TCP handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m829[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, update the offset calculation to use actual IP header [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is the Optimal Approach[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause**: Validates IP header length BEFORE calling `mkpay` in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`, preventing the initial pointer corruption.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Defense in Depth**: Multiple layers of protection:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validation in `mg_tcpip_rx` before `mkpay`[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Safety check inside `mkpay` itself[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Bounds checking in `rx_ip` for each protocol[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Minimal Code Changes**: Focuses on the vulnerable path without restructuring [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe entire packet processing logic.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Preserves Existing Logic**: All protocol handlers continue to work as [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdesigned, just with proper bounds validation.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Codebase Logic[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. IPv4 options handling continues to work - we just validate the header length is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin bounds[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. IPv6 processing is unaffected [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdifferent code path[0m[1;39m)[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. All protocol handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mARP, DHCP, TCP, UDP, ICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m retain their existing logic[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Packet truncation based on IP length field is preserved[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Fragmentation handling continues to work[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issues in the Evaluation Report[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Fixes the Primary Issue**: The heap-buffer-overflow at `rx_icmp:[0m[1;36m385[0m[39m` is [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevented because:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `pkt->pay` is no longer corrupted [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmkpay receives valid pointer[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `pkt->icmp` points to the correct location [0m[1;39m([0m[39maccounts for IP options[0m[1;39m)[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Bounds validation ensures `pkt->icmp` is within buffer before dereferencing[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Handles the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte Test Case**: With a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte packet [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m14[0m[39m eth + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m IP [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, if IHL claims [0m[1;36m15[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m60[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line check: `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m60[0m[39m > pkt.raw.buf + [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m` → returns early[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Prevents mkpay from being called with out-of-bounds pointer[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Prevents the overflow from occurring[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Addresses All Protocol Handlers**: The same validation pattern is applied to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP, UDP, TCP, and fragmented packets.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Stricter Validation May Reject Some Packets**: Packets with invalid IHL values[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill now be dropped.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: This is correct behavior - malformed packets should be [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrejected.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Performance Impact**: Additional bounds checks on every packet.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: The checks are simple comparisons, negligible performance [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimpact. Security is more important.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **IPv4 Options in Fragments**: While rare, fragments with options could be [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrejected.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: RFC [0m[1;36m791[0m[39m states fragments typically don't have options except [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe first fragment. Current code already doesn't fully support this case.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Reference to Similar Solutions[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe DHCP handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_dhcp_client` at line [0m[1;36m404[0m[39m and `rx_dhcp_server` at line [0m[1;36m462[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malready use this exact pattern:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOur fix applies this proven pattern consistently across all protocol handlers.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/11/26 23:08:04][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=174938;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=104048;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         vm.mmap_rnd_bits = [1;36m28[0m                                                                [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Seed: [0m[1;36m3888260844[0m                                                               [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Loaded [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m modules   [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m5018[0m[39m inline [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-bit counters[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: [0m[1;36m5018[0m[39m [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x5621e01ad708[0m[39m, [0m        [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability detected by [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer during fuzzing of the mongoose networking library. The crash [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs in the `rx_icmp` function at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c`, where a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread occurs beyond the bounds of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated heap region. The patch attempt[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madded boundary checks for IP header lengths and pointer validation before accessing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket data structures, but the same crash persists at the same location after [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying the patch, indicating that the root cause was not addressed.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report reveals a heap-buffer-overflow occurring during ICMP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket processing:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: `rx_icmp` function at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m`[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type**: READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Memory region**: The address is located [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Call stack**: The crash originates from `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp`[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe shadow bytes show the memory layout:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x504000000100[0m[39m: fa fa [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m fa fa fa [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m02[0m[1;39m][0m[39mfa[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m02[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` indicates that [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m bytes are partially addressable at the overflow [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation, while attempting to read [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte beyond this boundary.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempted to address buffer overflow issues by adding multiple boundary [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks throughout the IP packet processing code:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Modified `mkpay` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m147[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m157[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added a check to verify that pointer `p` does not exceed `pkt->raw.buf + [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.len`[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Sets an empty payload if the pointer is beyond the buffer boundary[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Modified `rx_ip` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m793[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m849[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calculated IP header length: `uint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added validation: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m || [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen > [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return`[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed pointer arithmetic from `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for all protocol handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added bounds checks after setting protocol-specific pointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->udp`, `pkt->tcp`, `pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Updated TCP offset calculation to use `ip_hlen` instead of `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Modified `mg_tcpip_rx` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m888[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m914[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added validation for IP header length range: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m || ip_hlen > [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return`[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added buffer boundary check: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen > pkt.raw.buf + [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return`[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Simplified payload calculation by consistently using `ip_hlen`[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Result[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the exact same crash occurs:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Same location**: `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;92m385:18[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Same address**: `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Same memory region**: [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Identical call stack**: `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp`[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe persistence of the identical crash indicates that:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The added boundary checks in `rx_ip` and `mg_tcpip_rx` are either bypassed or [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minsufficient[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The actual overflow occurs within the `rx_icmp` function itself at line [0m[1;36m385[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The bounds checks added before calling `rx_icmp` do not prevent the problematic [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **The `rx_icmp` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This is where the actual overflow occurs[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The function's logic for accessing ICMP packet data needs examination[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Specific line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m must be analyzed to understand what read operation is [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcausing the overflow[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **ICMP packet structure and payload handling**:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How `pkt->icmp` is set and validated[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the payload [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is calculated for ICMP packets[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The relationship between `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and subsequent data [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccess[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Packet payload initialization**:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mkpay` function modification may not be sufficient[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The calculation `&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p` needs verification[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Understanding how `pkt->pay.len` is used throughout the codebase[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **The test case characteristics**:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer input is [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes, which triggers this specific overflow[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Understanding the packet structure that leads to this crash would help [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentify the missing validation[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Call site analysis in `rx_ip`**:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The line `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;` should prevent [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalling `rx_icmp` with insufficient data[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This check may not be evaluating the correct condition or `pkt->pay.len` may [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe incorrectly set[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch added necessary structural checks for IP header validation and pointer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marithmetic corrections, but failed to address the specific condition that allows [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` to read beyond the allocated buffer at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Seed: [0m[1;36m2498776180[0m                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRunning: [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow on address [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m at pc[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x5577edf3fc02[0m[39m bp [0m[1;36m0x7ffde8a71b80[0m[39m sp [0m[1;36m0x7ffde8a71b78[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mREAD of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m thread T0[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSCARINESS: [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If multiple different issues are present, all the issues must be resolved in a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msingle patch attempt.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Try different approaches to resolve the issues.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
