[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m823[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m824[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m825[0m[39m:    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m826[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m827[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m828[0m[39m:    uint16_t iplen = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    uint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m830[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen >= off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen - off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m831[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"TCP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m832[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m833[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m834[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m835[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the evaluation report and code snippets, I've identified the root [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcause of the persistent heap-buffer-overflow. The previous patch attempted to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress the issue but had critical flaws:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **The patch modified `rx_ip` to calculate `ip_hlen` and use it for pointer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marithmetic**, which was correct in principle[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **However, `rx_ip` receives `pkt` where `pkt->pay` was already set by [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`**, and the checks in `rx_ip` don't prevent the actual crash[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **The real issue: In `mg_tcpip_rx` at lines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m892[0m[39m, there's no validation that [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe claimed IP header length fits within the buffer** before calling `mkpay` with a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpotentially out-of-bounds pointer[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWith a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte malicious packet where the IP header's IHL field claims a length [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarger than available space:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Buffer: [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes total [0m[1;39m([0m[39mEth: [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m bytes, leaving [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If IHL claims [0m[1;36m24[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[33mIHL[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, `mkpay` is called with pointer at offset [0m[1;36m38[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[1;36m14[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m24[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This causes `pkt->pay.len` calculation to underflow: `&buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m34[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - &buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m38[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` = [0m[1;36m-4[0m[39m →[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarge unsigned value[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The checks in `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are bypassed due[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto this large value[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- When `rx_icmp` is called and tries to access `pkt->icmp->type` at line [0m[1;36m384[0m[39m, it [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreads beyond the buffer[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch added the IP header length calculation in `rx_ip`, but:[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- It didn't fix the root cause in `mg_tcpip_rx` where the payload pointer can go [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout of bounds[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The boundary checks in `rx_ip` came too late - `pkt->pay.len` was already [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrupted[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Fix `mg_tcpip_rx` to validate IP header length before calling `mkpay`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m882[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m896[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. After validating IP version at line [0m[1;36m890[0m[39m, extract and validate the IP header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Ensure the complete IP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m fits within the buffer[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Only then call `mkpay` with the correct pointer position[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSpecific changes:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter line [0m[1;36m890[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Calculate: uint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Validate: if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m || ip_hlen > [0m[1;36m60[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IHL must be [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m15[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Validate: if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Must fit in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReplace lines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[39m:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Remove the if/else that handles IP options inconsistently[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Use: [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  This works for both cases [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith or without options[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis prevents `mkpay` from being called with an out-of-bounds pointer, which [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevents the `pkt->pay.len` underflow.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Maintain the `rx_ip` fixes from the previous patch[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKeep the changes from the previous patch in `rx_ip` function:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Calculate IP header length at the start of the function[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Use `ip_hlen` for all protocol pointer arithmetic[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Add boundary checks after setting each protocol pointer[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Fix TCP offset calculation to use `ip_hlen`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThese changes ensure that even if `mg_tcpip_rx` passes valid data, `rx_ip` handles [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP options correctly.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Fix the `mkpay` function to handle edge cases[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch added a check in `mkpay` to handle pointers beyond the buffer, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut it could be improved:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` catches out-of-bounds [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- However, setting `pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` may not be the best approach[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Instead, this should be a critical error that shouldn't occur if earlier [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidations are correct[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Keep the safety check but also ensure it's never actually triggered by fixing the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot causes[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Ensure consistency across all protocol handlers[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix must be applied consistently:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ICMP handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m802[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- UDP handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m807[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- TCP handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m825[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fragmented packet handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m797[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m798[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAll must use `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Why This Fix Works[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Prevents the root cause**: By validating IP header length in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore calling `mkpay`, we prevent the pointer from going out of bounds[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Prevents `pkt->pay.len` underflow**: With valid pointers, the calculation in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mkpay` produces correct payload lengths[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Handles IP options correctly**: Using actual IP header length instead of [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` respects variable-length headers[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Multiple layers of defense**: Even if one check fails, the additional [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidations in `rx_ip` provide safety[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Preserves existing functionality**: The fix supports both packets with and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout IP options without changing the API or breaking existing code[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Rejected packets**: Malformed packets with invalid IHL fields will now be [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrejected[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: This is desired behavior for security[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Performance**: Additional checks add minimal overhead[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: These are simple comparisons that execute quickly[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **IPv6 compatibility**: The changes are IPv4-specific[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: IPv6 uses fixed-size headers and already works correctly [0m[1;39m([0m[39mverified[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min code analysis[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Reference to Similar Patterns[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe DHCP handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m402[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m404[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m460[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m462[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m demonstrate the correct boundary [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecking pattern:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis same defensive pattern should be applied when setting protocol headers.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m0x504000000300[0m[39m: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m0x504000000380[0m[39m: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mShadow byte legend [0m[1;39m([0m[39mone shadow byte represents [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m application bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Addressable:           [0m[1;36m00[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmplghktuod[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability detected by [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASan[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function of the Mongoose networking [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibrary. The crash occurs when fuzzing the codebase with a specific testcase, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcausing a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read operation beyond allocated memory boundaries. A patch was [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempted that adds multiple bounds checks throughout the packet parsing code, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparticularly in `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` functions. However, after [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying the patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow error persists at the exact same [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating that the patch did [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot successfully resolve the root cause of the vulnerability.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report shows a heap-buffer-overflow with the following [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacteristics:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` in the `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Error Type**: READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Scariness Score**: [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Memory Region**: The address is located [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` allocated in the fuzzer's test harness[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe call stack reveals:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The overflow originates in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Called from `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m897[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Triggered by the fuzzer entry point `[0m[1;35mLLVMFuzzerTestOneInput[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m106[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe memory was allocated in the fuzzer test harness at line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m of [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/test/[0m[95mfuzz.c[0m[39m`, which creates a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer for testing.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch introduces comprehensive bounds checking across multiple functions:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **In `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m157[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adds a check to verify if pointer `p` is beyond the buffer bounds[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Sets an empty payload if the pointer exceeds `pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len`[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Otherwise, calculates payload normally[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m388[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m389[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adds validation before accessing ICMP fields[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Checks if `pkt->icmp` plus the size of the ICMP structure exceeds buffer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Returns early if validation fails[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **In `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m801[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m847[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calculates IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ip_hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m as `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validates that `ip_hlen` is at least [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes and fits within the buffer[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adds bounds checks before setting `pkt->udp`, `pkt->tcp`, and `pkt->icmp` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Uses proper pointer arithmetic with `ip_hlen` instead of `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adjusts TCP payload offset calculation to use `ip_hlen`[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **In `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m908[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m912[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validates IP header length is between [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m60[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL of [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensures the IP header fits within the buffer before processing[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Uses calculated `ip_hlen` instead of assuming fixed header size[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the identical error persists:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same crash location: `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory address: `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same scariness score: [0m[1;36m12[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same call stack and error characteristics[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates that:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The bounds check added at line [0m[1;36m389[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchecking `pkt->icmp + [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is not preventing the overflow at line [0m[1;36m385[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in the original code is the problematic line that needs investigation[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The overflow occurs before or at a location not covered by the added bounds [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function**: This is the exact location where the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow occurs. The code at this line needs to be examined to understand what [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecific operation is causing the [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read beyond buffer boundaries. The line [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mappears to be checking `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m` which suggests the overflow [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmay occur when accessing the `type` field of the ICMP header.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **ICMP Header Parsing Logic**: The bounds check added before line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m validates [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat `pkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is within bounds, but the actual access at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m still causes an overflow. This suggests either:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The check is performed after the problematic code[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The check logic is incorrect[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - There's an off-by-one error in the validation[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Packet Structure and Pointer Calculations**: The `pkt` structure and how [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers within it are calculated need examination. The fact that a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggers this specific overflow suggests the packet parsing logic doesn't properly [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccount for minimal packet sizes.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **The `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` Function Interaction**: While bounds checking was added to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, it's called throughout the packet parsing flow. The interaction between [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` setting `pkt->pay` and subsequent pointer accesses needs investigation.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Test Case Characteristics**: The [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte test case that triggers this overflow[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould be analyzed to understand what specific packet structure or edge case it [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrepresents. This would help identify what minimal packet structure causes the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparser to fail.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Line Number Correspondence**: The error consistently reports line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in both [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe original and patched code, but the patch adds checks at line [0m[1;36m389[0m[39m. This suggests[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m precedes the added check, meaning the overflow occurs before the [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation can prevent it.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m807[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m808[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:#define IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK [0m[1;36m0x1fff[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:#define IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK [0m[1;36m0x2000[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:  uint8_t ttl;    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Time to live[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:  uint8_t proto;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Upper level protocol[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:  uint16_t csum;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Checksum[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
