[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m835[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:806[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m823[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m807[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m808[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m809[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m810[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"UDP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m811[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m812[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m813[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_client && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m68[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m814[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m815[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m816[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_server && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m818[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m819[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m820[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m821[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m822[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_udp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m823[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the code snippets and evaluation report, I've identified the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfundamental issue:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**The crash occurs because `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` incorrectly calculates protocol header [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers when IPv4 packets contain options, using a fixed [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte offset instead of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe actual IP header length.**[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFor a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte packet with IP options [0m[1;39m([0m[33mIHL[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, meaning [0m[1;36m24[0m[39m-byte IP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Ethernet: [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m bytes  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- IP header: [0m[1;36m24[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m base + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m options[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Remaining: [0m[1;36m-4[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno room for ICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe bug flow:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` correctly calculates payload using actual IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` incorrectly sets `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m, using fixed [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte offset[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. This makes `pkt->icmp` point [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes too early [0m[1;39m([0m[39minside IP options area, or [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The check at line [0m[1;36m803[0m[39m validates `pkt->pay.len` instead of validating the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` pointer itself[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m384[0m[39m immediately accesses `pkt->icmp->type`, causing [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why the previous patch failed:** The patch added bounds checks AFTER setting the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol pointers and AFTER accessing them in some cases. The check needs to happen[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBEFORE any field access.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Fix `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` Function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mPrimary Fix[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m1.1[0m[39m:** At the beginning of `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mright after line [0m[1;36m795[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, calculate and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidate the actual IP header length:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m || ip_hlen > [0m[1;36m60[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IHL must be [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m15[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IP header [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmust fit[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m1.2[0m[39m:** Replace ALL protocol pointer assignments to use `ip_hlen` instead of [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Fragmented packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m797[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m798[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->tcp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **ICMP [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m802[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **UDP [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m807[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **TCP [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m825[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->tcp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m1.3[0m[39m:** Fix TCP payload offset calculation at line [0m[1;36m829[0m[39m:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mReplace `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with `ip_hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m1.4[0m[39m:** Remove or keep existing `pkt->pay.len` checks [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m803[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m808[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m826[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mas they provide secondary validation, but they are no longer the primary defense.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Add Safety Check to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDefense in Depth[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAt the very beginning of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbefore line [0m[1;36m384[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add a bounds check:[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis provides defense-in-depth in case `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is called from other paths.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Add Safety Check to `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mPrevent Underflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m152[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add bounds validation:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstatic void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Empty payload if beyond buffer[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis prevents unsigned underflow when the pointer is beyond the buffer.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Validate IP Header Length in `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mEarly Validation[0m[1;39m)[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` after line [0m[1;36m890[0m[39m, add early validation before calling `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m || ip_hlen > [0m[1;36m60[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen > pkt.raw.buf + pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThen use `ip_hlen` for the mkpay call:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis eliminates the conditional at lines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[39m and ensures consistent handling.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why this is the optimal approach:**[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause:** Fixes the incorrect pointer arithmetic that assumes [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixed [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte IP headers[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Systematic:** Applies the same fix pattern to all affected protocols [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mUDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Defense in Depth:** Multiple validation layers [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and protocol handlers[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Preserves Logic:** Maintains existing packet processing flow and functionality[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Standards Compliant:** Correctly handles IPv4 options per RFC [0m[1;36m791[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**How it preserves existing codebase logic:**[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The IP header length calculation `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m` is already used in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m892[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The bounds checking pattern `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mptr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > buf + len` is already [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mused in DHCP handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m404[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m462[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No changes to external APIs or fuzzing logic[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- TCP/UDP/ICMP protocol handlers continue to work with correctly positioned [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**How it addresses the evaluation report issues:**[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fixes the exact crash location: line [0m[1;36m384[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` accessing [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type`[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Ensures `pkt->icmp` points to valid memory before `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is called[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Prevents the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte packet scenario from causing overflow[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Works for all packet sizes and IP header configurations[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Potential side effects and mitigation:**[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Side effect:** Malformed packets with invalid IHL values will be rejected [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mearlier[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation:** This is desired behavior - invalid packets should be dropped[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Side effect:** Packets with IP options will now be handled correctly instead of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpotentially crashing[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation:** This is the fix objective - no mitigation needed[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Side effect:** Additional bounds checks may have minimal performance impact[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation:** Checks are simple comparisons, impact is negligible compared to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msecurity benefit[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Reference to similar solutions:**[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe bounds checking pattern used in this fix matches the existing pattern in [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m404[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m462[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which already correctly[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidate structure pointers before accessing them. This fix applies the same proven[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern systematically across all protocol handlers.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
